CustomField.description: Fields to check if any of the 5 account is nor verification approved
CustomField.formula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Account__r.Status__c, 'Verification Approved')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Account__r.Status__c, 'Verification Approved')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Ship_To_Account__r.Status__c , 'Verification Approved')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Address__r.Status__c, 'Verification Approved')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL( Ship_To_Address__r.Status__c, 'Verification Approved'))
CustomField.label: pendingGovernance
